reviewText: I purchased this movie for my little sister and watched it with her, she loved it and so did I! She loved the animals and seeing them "talk" and I loved that it was a wholesome yet entertaining movie for her to enjoy. I'll check out the other "Adventures of Bailey" movies in the near future.
We loved the movie!  Great family, and we highly recommend it.  Hope there will be sequels.  Kids were mesmerized by it!!!

We found this family-friendly movie and bought a copy for our library. After watching it with the whole family we found it to have a very sweet story line with animal and human actors to add to the fun. The script has a lot of funny lines that make you chuckle. The bad guys are actually quite charming. Loved the different breeds of dogs and how they performed with each other and with their humans. "Adventures of Bailey: A Night in Cowtown" will definitely be watched over and over. I would highly recommend this movie to all ages. Looking forward to the next one!Adventures of Bailey: A Night in Cowtown
Not as cute as the first Bailey movie.
Very happy with the dvd and the service
Not a great dog movie, but not a bad one either.... I guess...
Perfect gift.  I ordered this for several of my nephews and nieces.  They really enjoyed the movie.  Thank you very much.
I abought this for my granddaughter for Christmas.  She is an avid dog movie fan and I think she will enjoy this movie.
What a wonderful family movie to watch especially if you are a dog lover! Would also make a nice birthday gift for a child!
I loved the animals in this movie. They were all so well trained. So nice to have a family movie that all can watch and enjoy, need more of these......Would recommend this movie!
